treatment-md.title: Skrjabinodon heliocostai Vicente, Vrcibradic, Muniz-Pereira & Pinto 2000
treatment-md.article-title: Type material of Acanthocephala, Nematoda and other non-helminths phyla (Cnidaria, Annelida, and Arthropoda) housed in the Helminthological Collection of the Oswaldo Cruz Institute / FIOCRUZ (CHIOC), Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, from 1979 to 2016
